医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：反堕胎强硬派大声疾呼随着堕胎成为 11 月选举的关键问题，联合起来推翻罗伊诉韦德案的运动在是否走得更远、更快——包括惩罚堕胎者和禁止避孕或试管受精方面存在分歧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Anti-abortion-hard-liners-speak-up.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Anti-abortion-hard-liners-speak-up.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8237d07-3f95-4248-b83c-d6859b3210f4 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:28:00 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Anti-abortion hard-liners speak up
研究发现，母亲大麻使用障碍与儿童自闭症风险较高有关《精神病学研究》的一项研究表明，母亲大麻使用障碍会显着增加后代患自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）的风险。产前接触大麻的儿童的风险高出 3.5 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Maternal-cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-higher-autism-risk-in-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Maternal-cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-higher-autism-risk-in-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a18b5131-3c37-4fe1-8f51-6c81a30a7917 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:26:00 -0400 Maternal cannabis use disorder linked to higher autism risk in children, study finds
定制聚合物胶束以改善奥拉帕尼溶解度和药物释放奥拉帕尼是一种选择性聚（ADP-核糖）聚合酶抑制剂。然而，其临床应用受到低溶解度和不良药代动力学特征（例如相对较短的循环）的阻碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Tailoring-polymeric-micelles-for-improved-olaparib-solubility-and-drug-release.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Tailoring-polymeric-micelles-for-improved-olaparib-solubility-and-drug-release.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dd1e999-ad18-447e-ad1f-4aadb659ec8b Thu, 23 May 2024 16:24:23 -0400 Tailoring polymeric micelles for improved olaparib solubility and drug release
综述：意义未明的异型性甲状腺结节的临床治疗细针抽吸细胞学 (FNAC) 是一种经济高效的甲状腺结节治疗技术。世界卫生组织甲状腺肿瘤分类的变化可能会影响细胞学的可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Review-Clinical-management-of-tropical-nodules-with-atypia-of-undependent-significance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Review-Clinical-management-of-tropical-nodules-with-atypia-of-undependent-significance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09aee6f9-99bd-491e-8ed3-e6d37ebcf7d2 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:21:14 -0400 Review: Clinical management of thyroid nodules with atypia of undetermined significance
研究发现参加癌症临床试验并没有显着的生存获益参与癌症临床试验通常表明生存率有所提高，但考虑到偏差的高质量研究显示没有显着的生存益处。由于混杂因素，试验效益可能被夸大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-finds-no-significant-survival-benefit-from-participating-in-cancer-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-finds-no-significant-survival-benefit-from-participating-in-cancer-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70aa0250-9b2a-43b2-b730-19c1d084bf8e Thu, 23 May 2024 16:19:00 -0400 Study finds no significant survival benefit from participating in cancer clinical trials
利用关键基因控制的分子途径提高小麦产量阿德莱德大学的一项研究发现，传统上用于控制小麦开花行为的基因调控的分子途径可以被改变，以获得更高的产量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Harnessing-molecular-pathways-governed-by-key-gene-to-enhance-wheat-yields.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Harnessing-molecular-pathways-governed-by-key-gene-to-enhance-wheat-yields.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83f16ad1-1958-43e2-8be2-52f990f02c77 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:15:42 -0400 Harnessing molecular pathways governed by key gene to enhance wheat yields
研究深入了解影响老年人停止驾驶的因素哪些因素导致老年人不再开车？一项新的研究跟踪没有记忆或思维问题的老年人来研究这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-offers-insights-into-factors-influencing-older-adults-to-stop-driven.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-offers-insights-into-factors-influencing-older-adults-to-stop-driven.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3ffa66-1b50-4644-b3c5-acdf5b678693 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:10:15 -0400 Study offers insights into factors influencing older adults to stop driving
研究揭示社交媒体使用与噩梦之间的联系，影响睡眠和心理健康研究人员根据无力感和受害等主题创建了一个量表来检测与社交媒体相关的不良梦境。他们发现社交媒体的使用与睡眠质量差、情绪健康和噩梦之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-reveals-link- Between-social-media-use-and-nightmares-impacting-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-reveals-link- Between-social-media-use-and-nightmares-impacting-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86c77f41-55ac-42c8-9846-f90c8f947d3e Thu, 23 May 2024 16:07:00 -0400 Study reveals link between social media use and nightmares, impacting sleep and mental health
Insilico Medicine 在 BIO 大会上发挥领导作用，解决人工智能药物发现的关键挑战临床阶段人工智能 (AI) 驱动的药物发现公司 Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）的领导层将出席 6 月 3 日至 6 日在圣地亚哥举行的 BIO 国际大会，并就人工智能药物发现面临的关键问题发表演讲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Insilico-Medicines-leadership-to-address-key-challenges-in-AI-drug-discovery-at-BIO-Convention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Insilico-Medicines-leadership-to-address-key-challenges-in-AI-drug-discovery-at-BIO-Convention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30753456-bb0e-4599-9e29-4e104cd3ee0d Thu, 23 May 2024 16:04:50 -0400 Insilico Medicine's leadership to address key challenges in AI drug discovery at BIO Convention
突破性研究揭示了阿尔茨海默病进展的分子驱动因素据美国疾病控制与预防中心称，目前至少有 580 万美国人患有阿尔茨海默病，这是最常见的痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Breakthrough-study-reveals-molecular-drivers-of-Alzheimers-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Breakthrough-study-reveals-molecular-drivers-of-Alzheimers-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b3ef3c5-9323-4dae-964d-1b6845de931f Thu, 23 May 2024 15:57:25 -0400 Breakthrough study reveals molecular drivers of Alzheimer's progression
